TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImageAnimator extends System.Object

summary.span: Animates an image that has time-based frames.

span.span: Animates an image that has time-based frames.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Animate (System.Drawing.Image image, EventHandler onFrameChangedHandler);

param.name: onFrameChangedHandler
param.span: An object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.

span.span: An object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.

summary.span: Displays a multiple-frame image as an animation.

span.span: Displays a multiple-frame image as an animation.

remarks.format: ## Examples Esta aplicación de formularios Windows Forms muestra cómo dibujar una imagen animada en la pantalla.This Windows Forms application demonstrates how to draw an animated image to the screen. La imagen se crea a partir del archivo GIF animado que SampleAnimation.gif, ubicado en la misma carpeta que la aplicación.The image is created from the animated GIF file SampleAnimation.gif located in the same folder as the application.
